website_summaries.verdict: A quality wood toy that is great for preschool and elementary-aged kids and provides hours of fun.
pros: Features more than 30 magnetic pieces to play dress up with Ariel
Includes a doll stand so Ariel can stand or lay down in her outfits
All pieces are made from wood and magnetic pieces stick well to Ariel
cons: Storage box doesn't have a lid, so can be easy to lose pieces

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Any of theses dolls from Melissa and Doug provide lots of fun and get children to use their imaginations. My granddaughter loves them and to make it easy for her I put them all on an ironing board (no cover of course) and have it adjusted for her height where she can stand or sit in her little chair to play. Perfect for all these little magnetic pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Melissa and Doug score again. We have the Little Mermaid and Belle for my 4 YO and 2 YO. They both love them and are a great travel toy too. Wish they came in a travel friendly case. We end up using a ziplock bag to tote around for vacation or to keep entertained out to dinner. Just picked up Sophia and Peppa from a friend so I’m sure the kids will continue their love. Some peices are very small though so not good for Kids that continue to put things in their mouth. My 2.5 YO is hit or miss so we have to watch her with these closely. Would definitely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mjonesy

customer_reviews.title: Great imagination play
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these figures and all the costume changes. She can play for an hour with the various figures (we have 4-Sleeping Beauty, Snow White,Ariel, and Belle) who talk to each other, plan parties together and dress for them. With what she knows from the movies these characters star in, she can create situations and dialogue for hours. I love Melissa and Doug. They create quality toys which spark imagination and encourage interactive play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s very well made so I’m sure it’ll last a very long time. It looks exactly as pictured. The only issue I have is it doesn’t come with a lid. It’s wooden storage box is nice, but why not have a top? These pieces will be lost in no time haha
customer_reviews.author: Momto4

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun way to do paper-dolls
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice and sturdier version of a paper doll. No cutting out, no trying to make flimsy paper stand up; this wooden set it where it's at. Plus it's cool that their are licensed characters. Woo!
customer_reviews.author: Dominic T. Sedillo

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Melissa and Doug are known for the quality of their merchandise and this is no exception. It was a big hit with my five year old granddaughter but I took one star away because some of the pieces/accessories are extremely small and can be easily lost (or swallowed by younger children). Not good with magnetized puzzle. pieces Also wish the storage box had some kind of lid on it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie K. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: A durable alternative to traditional paper dolls. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Melissa and Doug is a great brand for quality, long-lasting children's toys. Most toys are so cheap you throw them out after awhile. I'm glad there's a company making toys that you can pass down through generations, like the things my mom and dad played with and passed down to me. I loved paper dolls growing up, but they always ended up tearing. These magnetic dress-up wooden dolls are a great alternative to traditional paper dolls. It's also nice that they sell Disney princesses and not generic characters too, because kids want to play with their favorite characters and these were a big hit with my Disney-loving nieces.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle M.

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing but please follow the age guidelines,
customer_reviews.text: So i bought these for my 3 year old, but since she is tree she lost interest really fast and they ended up in the trash bin a few days later. The quality is what you would expect for the price, the items did not have sharp edges and did not break easily but then again kids lose interest fast. So please before you spend money on them make sure your kid will take care of them and enjoy them for years to come as I said earlier sturdy but has to be someone who will want to "dress up" the dolls. Neat idea :D
customer_reviews.author: Hector Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: mu four year old grand daughter loves this. Comes with several outfits including shoes and accessories which all stick to the magnetic doll very well. Just be aware that there are a lot of small accessories and can be easily put in the mouth if your child is one of those. Would recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Squiggy

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: I specifically ordered this Ariel because she was the same style as my daughters' other princesses (open under the arms). It came in and is the style that is closed under the arm and shorter than the other princesses. So my guess is the clothes won't be interchangeable.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Entertains my granddaughter for hours!
customer_reviews.text: I bought Ariel, Cinderella and Bell for my 3 yr. old granddaughter. She absolutely loves them! She literally played for hours the first day she had them! The first Ariel doll I received had a damaged piece, but I was able to return that set and received a replacement the next day! The wooden case they come in is nice, but a storage compartment with a lid would be helpful for all the small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne balcar

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dress up toy! My daughter has played with this so many times since we got this. She hasn't got bored of it whatsoever! It's very durable, the pieces are easy to keep together since their magnetic, and it's overall great quality. Definitely a buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I really didnt like that there was no lid to cover this product. It's just wrapped in cellophane. Once you open it, it's a free-for-all with the tiny shoes and accessories. I ended up ditching the little box it came in and put everything in a ziploc bag. It's a fun toy, and gets played with a lot. The packaging is it's downfall.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy, purchased as a gift for my 4 year old daughter who loves princesses. She can spend hours playing with this mix and matching Ariels clothes and accessories. Recommend to others with little girls!
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my goddaughter. It was her birthday. I wasn't sure what the quality would be. But she absolutely loved it. All the other kids wanted open and play with it at the party. She just turned four and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Fun but hard to keep in one place
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to play with this toy. However, I absolutely dislike there is no lid to keep all the little pieces together and I end up picking it up continuously from the floor or car whenever we take it with us.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Evgenieva

customer_reviews.title: My girls love princesses and Ariel is at the top of their ...
customer_reviews.text: My girls love princesses and Ariel is at the top of their list right now, so this is a great toy! The variety of pieces to dress Ariel is great and has been keeping them busy. Very cute and simple toy!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun with Ariel!
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 year old grand daughter loves this toy. She changes the outfits and has "adventures" with it for hours. It's great for a child with imagination. The pieces are sturdy and easy for little fingers to use. I fixed the "lack of storage top problem" with a jumbo, hefty slider bag and a large rubber band.
customer_reviews.author: mellu

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift for my friends daughter
customer_reviews.text: The kids played with this after the party for s good amount of time and loved it. So much so that my daughter now wants a set of her own for Christmas. love the simple side of it. Perfect for any princess fan
customer_reviews.author: KRocque

customer_reviews.title: Melissa & Doug Disney Ariel Magnetic Dress-Up
customer_reviews.text: Have bought many Melissa & Doug toys they are very well made. Strong & sturdy the grandchildren put them through the test. For 3 & 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: RainChimes

customer_reviews.title: Great for little mermaids!
customer_reviews.text: Another great Melissa and Doug Toy! We bought this magnetic dress up kit as a gift after a different M&D dress up set was a hit. This did not disappoint. I love that the toy and pieces come in a wooden box which I can continue to use for storage. I wish they designed these with a reusable lid though. This kit is a lot of fun for both my daughter and myself. It is well made.
customer_reviews.author: JHolland

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, fun for my 4 yr old
customer_reviews.text: This was s gift. My daughter played with it for the first month she had it but hasn’t touched it much. Would be nice if there were even more clothing options because she seems to be bored with it.
customer_reviews.author: goldenugget

customer_reviews.title: Inconvenient packaging
customer_reviews.text: I really like Melissa and Doug products but I often find the casing for the product is not very Convenient. Once removed from original packaging there’s no way to pack it back up for easy carrying or storage. I had to put all the pieces in a zip lock bag. I wish it had a top that could keep all the pieces in place.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa oriel

customer_reviews.title: The 'new' Paper Dolls
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grandaughter found this waiting for her in my toy closet this Thanksgiving. She loved it and sat down to play with it many times during her visit. When she wasn't dressing Ariel, she carried the little tray around with her during the day. Great quality and appeal to little ones. Not like the old paper dolls of Grandma's day, but the feeling is the same as I played with her, brought us both smiles.
customer_reviews.author: Marmaduke

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, tiny pieces
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because some of the pieces are so tiny they immediately got lost. Otherwise, a win!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Dress up Ariel
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my 4 yr old's friend for her bday and she wanted one too. Super cute and I have several of these with different princesses, keeps my daughter busy for a while changing all their outfits and accessories! I wish there was a better way to contain all the pieces, but its still a great little toy. My go to gift now for kids her age!
customer_reviews.author: Miss meliss

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a 3rd birthday party and ended up having to purchase it for my 4 year old daughter. This is an awesome gift and even I have fun playing it with her.
customer_reviews.author: arturo boyce

customer_reviews.title: Our five year old daughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the young Disney lover and creative play! We can spend over an hour just creating different outfits. Would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute! My friend’s 4 year old loves dressing up Ariel. It’s hard to store without a lid though. So her mom just put it in a ziploc bag.
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old went nuts over this! She hasn’t stopped playing with it. This might age me, but it reminded me of the paper dolls I used to play with...but better because it’s made of wood!

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old princess LOVES this! It kept her busy for an hour straight today! 🙌 Excellent for developing fine motor skills. Great quality product. I do wish there was a cover as many other reviews stated.

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay....
customer_reviews.text: It was very cute but too many small pieces. Would be better if more dresses and tops than tiny hair bows shoes and gloves. They just seem to get lost very quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, as always. I love Melissa & Doug products.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toy

customer_reviews.title: The product is good but the package was torn and stained

customer_reviews.title: Perfect engaging activity

customer_reviews.title: Great dress up toy

customer_reviews.title: Cute but lots of small pieces to pick up 😁

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Wish it came with a lid

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not practical
customer_reviews.text: Bought for gift but they didn't play with it long and the smaller pieces are easily lost

customer_reviews.title: Well made

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. My only complaint (my 3 yr old brought ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES Ariel. She plays with this over and over. Highly recommend. My only complaint (my 3 yr old brought it up), the shoes are both pointed to the right. She thought it was silly. Other than that, it's great.

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Ariel Wooden Magnetic Dress-Up Play Set
product_meta.description:
Ariel's mix-and-match fashions are sure to make a splash! Kids can combine the 30+ sturdy wooden magnetic pieces to tell the tale of the Little Mermaid . . . or create their own fashion story! The Melissa & Doug Disney Ariel Magnetic Dress-Up Wooden Doll Pretend Play Set includes one wooden play figure, a variety of magnetic clothing pieces and accessories, and doll stand. Plus, it comes in an easy-to-carry storage tray to bring the creative expression and imaginative thinking on-the-go. This set makes an exceptional gift for kids ages 3 to 6. Add the Melissa & Doug Disney Sleeping Beauty and Snow White Magnetic Dress-Up Wooden Doll Pretend Play Set to round out the hands-on, screen-free play experience. For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.” Today, Melissa & Doug is proudly partnering with the American Academy of Pediatrics to foster early brain development and help children build important life skills through play.

BRAND STORY
By Melissa & Doug

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!

See more
feature_bullets: ARIEL DRESS-UP SET: The Melissa & Doug Disney Ariel Magnetic Dress-Up Wooden Doll Pretend Play Set includes one wooden play figure, a variety of magnetic clothing pieces and accessories, and doll stand.
MIX-AND-MATCH OUTFITS: Mix-and-match 30+ sturdy wooden magnetic pieces to tell the tale of the Little Mermaid, land or sea!
GREAT FOR TRAVEL: Comes in an easy-to-carry storage tray to bring the creative expression and imaginative thinking on the go.

GREAT GIFT FOR AGES 3 TO 6: Makes an exceptional gift for kids ages 3 to 6. Add the Melissa & Doug Disney Sleeping Beauty and Snow White Magnetic Dress-Up Wooden Doll Pretend Play Set to round out the hands-on, screen-free play experience.

“THE GOLD STANDARD IN CHILDHOOD PLAY”: For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.”
